txt.en: 'There you are, [placeholder]. Luck would have it that I decided to enter Beorn's cave precisely before these drakes attacked. A group entered the cave, but I fought them off. It would seem they tried to desecrate our sacred cave and the Carrock!'

'There you are, [placeholder]. Luck would have it that I decided to enter Beorn's cave at the Carrock's base, precisely before these drakes attacked. A group entered the cave, but I fought them off. It would seem they tried to desecrate this sacred cave and the Carrock!'
Defeat Ormoth, the drake assault leader.
'The drakes, they approach. I must take leave, for Lord Gwaihir has bade me not to interfere. I have faith in your skills, [placeholder]. Farewell!'
The leader of the drake assault has arrived!
Protect the Carrock and defeat the attacking drakes
Defeat Ormoth, the drake assault leader.
Protect the Carrock and defeat the attacking drakes.
'We must tell Grimbeorn at once. He will be grateful to know that the Eagles gave you warning of this attack.'
